review: The Fire TV Stick did not work on the TV that I wanted to use it on. The TV was an older samsung 19 inch tv with HDMI slot. The tv wouldn't recognize the Fire TV Stick. I would not have purchased this if I had known that it wouldn't work on that tv. I got it for the 19.99 price so I have decided to keep it and use it on other tv sets. If I had paid the the 39.99 I would have returned it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's been a joy.  I've streamed certain apps through a blu-ray player and another gaming console but never experienced the performance I got with the Amazon Fire TV stick.  It's been amazing.  Can't wait to learn more of the things it's capable of!
author: J. Adkinson

review: My family uses 2 Kindle Fires, 1 Kindle Reader, and 1 Amazon Fire TV. Also 2 Roku devices. All 6 devices use the WiFi signal from my Comcast Modem/ Router with no problems. Neither of the 2 Sticks that I received could  access "Amazon.com" which was required during the installation. My problem was turned over to the Tech division who worked 2 weeks promising that they would call me on 12/13 with an update. No call so I returned the Sticks for a full refund.
